name: The World Tarot 3D Experience
description:
The final result of a semesters worth of work on an Unreal Engine 4 build based on the theme of the tarot card "The World." The build is made up of 119 primarily modular 3D assets that can be placed, rotated, and changed in a matter of ways to create a thorough city scene. 

The world tarot can represent the end of a journey, and this experience is supposed to encompass the stages of the players journey as they traverse through the winding, cramped paths of a city at night, ending in the wide open communal space above. Small depictions of the fools journey, which the World tarot represents the end of, can be found in each little section of the map. 

This is a student project made for this year's UW Stout Game Expo, which can be found online here
